title: Implement secure API authentication middleware
description: Build robust authentication middleware that validates API tokens, manages user sessions, and provides role-based access control to protect sensitive endpoints
iWant: comprehensive authentication and authorization for all API endpoints
soThat: I can prevent unauthorized access and maintain security compliance with 100% endpoint coverage
acceptanceCriteria: All API endpoints require valid authentication tokens
Role-based permissions are enforced within 50ms per request
Failed authentication attempts are logged and rate-limited
Session management supports automatic token refresh
